text: “Kodi yemwe akudzichepetsa (kwa Allah ndi kumpembedza) pakati pa usiku uku akugwetsa nkhope pansi ndi kuimilira, kuopa tsiku la chimaliziro ndi kuyembekezera chifundo cha Mbuye wake, (kodi angafanane ndi yemwe amapempha Allah akakhala pa mavuto pokha, akakhala pa mtendere ndikumuiwala?) Nena (kwa iwo, iwe Mtumiki {s.a.w}): “Kodi amene akudziwa ndi amene sakudziwa, ngofanana?” Ndithu ndi eni nzeru amene amalingalira
